title: BizApp Data Resource
description: OneCloud BizApp Resource.  This resource is a file that a OneCloud BizApp requires to run a command.

profile.title: Profile
profile.context: Every Package and Resource descriptor has a profile. The default profile, if none is declared, is `data-package` for Package and `data-resource` for Resource.

pluginId.title: BizApp ID
pluginId.description: The unique ID of the associated BizApp.

name.title: Name
name.description: An identifier string. Lower and upper case characters with `.`, `_`, `-` and `/` are allowed.
name.context: This is ideally a url-usable and human-readable name. Name `SHOULD` be invariant, meaning it `SHOULD NOT` change when its parent descriptor is updated.

path.title: Path
path.description: A reference to the data for this resource, as either a path as a string, or an array of paths as strings. of valid URIs.

oneOf.title: Path
oneOf.description: A fully qualified URL, or a POSIX file path..
oneOf.context: Implementations need to negotiate the type of path provided, and dereference the data accordingly.

items.title: Path
items.description: A fully qualified URL, or a POSIX file path..
items.context: Implementations need to negotiate the type of path provided, and dereference the data accordingly.

path.context: The dereferenced value of each referenced data source in `path` `MUST` be commensurate with a native, dereferenced representation of the data the resource describes. For example, in a *Tabular* Data Resource, this means that the dereferenced value of `path` `MUST` be an array.

description.title: Description
description.description: A text description. Markdown is encouraged.

format.title: Format
format.description: The file format of this resource.

mediatype.title: Media Type
mediatype.description: The media type of this resource. Can be any valid media type listed with [IANA](https://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml).

encoding.title: Encoding
encoding.description: The file encoding of this resource.

encrypted.title: Encrypted
encrypted.description: Whether or not the resource is encrypted.

cdn.title: CDN Enabled
cdn.description: Whether or not the resource path should be CDN signed when passing this resource to another service.

bytes.title: Bytes
bytes.description: The size of this resource in bytes.

hash.title: Hash
hash.description: The MD5 hash of this resource. Indicate other hashing algorithms with the {algorithm}:{hash} format.
